IVI Compliance Category:
-----------------------

IVI-C IviScope Specific Instrument Driver

Class Specification version:    4.1
IVI Generation:                 2014
Group Capabilities Supported:

Base                            = Supported
Interpolation                   = Not Supported
TVTrigger                       = Supported
RuntTrigger                     = Not Supported
GlitchTrigger                   = Supported
WidthTrigger                    = Not Supported
AcLineTrigger                   = Supported
WaveformMeasurement             = Supported
MinMaxWaveform                  = Supported
ProbeAutoSense                  = Not Supported
ContinuousAcquisition           = Supported
AverageAcquisition              = Supported
SampleMode                      = Not Supported
TriggerModifier                 = Supported
AutoSetup                       = Supported


Optional Features:
-----------------
Interchangeability Checking     = True
State Caching                   = True
Coercion Recording              = True


Driver Identification:
---------------------
Driver Revision:               3.74.49152
Driver Vendor:                 National Instruments
Prefix:                        tktds1k2k
Description:                   Digital Oscilloscope



Driver Release Information:
--------------------------
Original Release Date:                  08/28/2002
Update Release Date:                    10/20/2015



Hardware Information:
--------------------
Instrument Manufacturer:                Tektronix
Supported Instrument Models:            TDS 1001, TDS 1002, TDS 1012, TDS 2002, TDS 2004, TDS 2012, TDS 2014, TDS 2022, TDS 2024, TPS 2012,
                                        TPS2014, TPS 2024, TDS 1001B, TDS 1002B, TDS 1012B,TDS2002B, TDS 2004B, TDS 2012B, TDS 2014B, TDS 2022B,
                                        TDS 2024B, TDS 1001B-SC, TDS 1002B-SC, TDS 1012B-SC, TDS 1001C-SC, TDS 1002C-SC,TDS1012C-SC,TDS1001C,TDS1002C,
                                        TDS1012C, TDS2001C, TDS2002C, TDS2004C, TDS2012C, TDS2014C, TDS2022C, TDS2024C, TDS1001C-EDU, TDS1002C-EDU,
                                        TDS1012C-EDU, TPS2012B, TPS2014B, TPS2024B, TBS1022, TBS1042, TBS1062, TBS1102, TBS1152, TBS1064, TBS1104,
                                        TBS1154, TBS1052B-EDU, TBS1072B-EDU, TBS1102B-EDU, TBS1152B-EDU, TBS1202B-EDU, TBS1052B, TBS1072B, TBS1102B,
                                        TBS1152B, TBS1202B, TBS1032B
Supported Bus Interfaces:               Serial, GPIB, USB



32-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems:              Windows 7 (32-bit), Windows 7 (64-bit), Windows 8 (32-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit)
                                          Windows 10 (32-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit)
Support Software Required:                IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1, VISA 5.2 or later
Source Code Availability:                 Available


64-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems:              Windows 7 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit)
Unsupported Operation Systems:            N/A
Support Software Required:                IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1, VISA 5.2 or later
Source Code Availability:                 Available



Unit Testing:
------------
Test Setup 1:

Instrument Model (Firmware Revision):     TBS 1052B,QU100001,CF:91.1CT FV:v2.42; TBS1032B, CF:91.1CT FV:v4.06
Bus Interface:                            USB
Operating System (Service Pack):          Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness/Application Bitness:           64-bit/32-bit
VISA Vendor and Version:                  NI-VISA 14.0
IVI Shared Components Version:            2.2.1



Driver Installation Testing:
---------------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):          Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness:                               32-bit, 64-bit



Driver Buildability:
-------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):          Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness:                               32-bit, 64-bit



Driver Test Failures:
--------------------
Known Issues:                             None


Note:
National Instruments has evaluated and/or tested this driver to verify that it meets all applicable requirements of the IVI specifications
at the time this compliance document was submitted to the IVI Foundation and agrees to abide by the dispute arbitration provisions
in Section 8 of IVI-1.2: Operating Procedures, if the IVI Foundation finds this driver to be non-conformant.
